headline: C.H. Robinson Now Accepting for Global Scholarship Program to Further Support Carriers; Applications for annual program are now open until February 28th for contract carriers and their dependents
summary: For more than a decade, leading global logistics provider C.H. Robinson has supported access to higher education by awarding more than $1 million in scholarships to contract carriers and their...
